item.title: ABOUT US
item.dc:creator: manas
item.content:encoded:
We aspire to become one of the most trusted organizations of India with strong focus on innovation , research and client support. We strongly believe that the chief focus areas for any enterprise is:
  • Gain competitive advantage
  • User delight
  • Efficient/productive workforce
  • Resource optimization
Orduino Labs Pvt Ltd is strongly building the organization on the basis of the above said parameters .We are having a Pan India operation. At present we are having distributors in Odisha , Bihar and Jharkhand for our VTS operation and are planning to expand our base in another 8 major states of India . OUR MISSION : We had begun with a dream and your dream is our future. Our mission is to exceed our clients expectations by meeting business and strategic project goals in a manner that provides them competitive advantages in their business. OUR VISION : Our vision is to create unconventional solutions for a brighter tomorrowfor our customers business and to be recognized as an innovator, helping customers realize the best results in technologies.

item.title: Pricing Policy
item.dc:creator: manas
item.content:encoded: Price Range At ORDUINO we have customised pricing according to the services rendered by us. The details are provided to you beforehand according to the effort, efficiency and the output of the service. Typically the range of transactions on our website varies from INR 7500 - 8500 depending on the models(Classic and Classic'+'). Schedule of payment Some of our services can be utilised for fixed durations. In such cases, it is clearly mentioned within the description of these services. The period of usage in these cases vary from 1 month to 1 year. Price Matching At ORDUINO we are committed to offering you the best possible prices. We will be glad to meet our competitor's pricing if you ever find an item that we offer, in the same color and size, available from a similar retailer. We are unable to match prices from auction and outlet stores or websites, as well as other retailers' discount promotions, shipping offers and gift card offers. Sale Adjustment If an item you have purchased is reduced in price within two weeks of your order date, we will happily adjust the sale price for you. Please note that we can only make one sale adjustment per item and designer goods originally purchased on sale are excluded. Pricing Errors We work hard to ensure the accuracy of pricing. Despite our efforts, pricing errors may still occur. If an item's price is higher than the price displayed, we will cancel your order of that item and notify you of the cancellation. Shopping Cart Items in your Shopping Cart reflect the current price displayed on the item's product details page. Please note: This price may differ from the price displayed when the item was first placed in your Shopping Cart. Our merchandise/service is offered for sale by ORDUINO for your personal enjoyment and not for resale. Therefore, we reserve the right to refuse to sell to any person whom we believe may be purchasing for resale. Our Customer Service Specialists are ready to assist yousimply call 1800-123-0401, 0674-6006061, 0674-6006062(10:00AM - 6:30PM).

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: manas
item.content:encoded: SECTION 1 - WHAT DO WE DO WITH YOUR INFORMATION? When you purchase something from our store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address. When you browse our store, we also automatically receive your computers internet protocol (IP) address in order to provide us with information that helps us learn about your browser and operating system. Email marketing (if applicable): With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates. SECTION 2 - CONSENT How do you get my consent? When you provide us with personal information to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order, arrange for a delivery or return a purchase, we imply that you consent to our collecting it and using it for that specific reason only. If we ask for your personal information for a secondary reason, like marketing, we will either ask you directly for your expressed consent, or provide you with an opportunity to say no. How do I withdraw my consent? If after you opt-in, you change your mind, you may withdraw your consent for us to contact you, for the continued collection, use or disclosure of your information, at anytime, by Contact us : 1800-123-0401Email: info@lokate.inCompany Office Address: ORDUINO LABS PVT LTD, room no: 113, 1st floor, KIIT-TBI, campus 11, Patia, Bhubaneswar-751024, Odisha, India. SECTION 3 - DISCLOSURE We may disclose your personal information if we are required by law to do so or if you violate our Terms of Service. SECTION 4 - PAYMENT We use Razorpay for processing payments. We/Razorpay do not store your card data on their servers. The data is encrypted through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS) when processing payment. Your purchase transaction data is only used as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. After that is complete, your purchase transaction information is not saved. Our payment gateway adheres to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and its service providers. SECTION 5 - THIRD-PARTY SERVICES In general, the third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to allow them to perform the services they provide to us. However, certain third-party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies in respect to the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase-related transactions. For these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies so you can understand the manner in which your personal information will be handled by these providers. In particular, remember that certain providers may be located in or have facilities that are located a different jurisdiction than either you or us. So if you elect to proceed with a transaction that involves the services of a third-party service provider, then your information may become subject to the laws of the jurisdiction(s) in which that service provider or its facilities are located. Once you leave our stores website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our websites Terms of Service. Links: When you click on links on our store, they may direct you away from our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites and encourage you to read their privacy statements. SECTION 6 - SECURITY To protect your personal information, we take reasonable precautions and follow industry best practices to make sure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed. SECTION 7 - COOKIES We use cookies to maintain session of your user. It is not used to personally identify you on other websites. SECTION 8 - AGE OF CONSENT By using this site, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site. SECTION 9 - CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it. If our store is acquired or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owners so that we may continue to sell products to you. QUESTIONS AND CONTACT INFORMATION If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, register a complaint, or simply want more information contact our Privacy Compliance Officer at info@lokate.in . [Re: Privacy Compliance Officer] [Room no - 113, KIIT TBI, Campus 11, KIIT University, Patia, Bhubaneswar - 751024, Odisha.]

item.title: Refund/Cancellation Policy
item.dc:creator: manas
item.content:encoded: Returns Our policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we cant offer you a refund or exchange. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases. To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase. Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer. There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted: (if applicable) Book with obvious signs of use Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error. Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery. Refunds (if applicable) Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days. Late or missing refunds (if applicable) If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again. Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted. Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted. If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at 1800-123-0401, 0674-6006061, 0674-6006062. Sale items (if applicable) Only regular priced items may be refunded, unfortunately sale items cannot be refunded. Exchanges (if applicable) We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at info@lokate.inand send your item to: ORDUINO LABS PVT LTD, room no: 113, 1st floor, KIIT-TBI, campus 11, Patia, Bhubaneswar-751024, Odisha, India. Gifts If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you. If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and he will find out about your return. Shipping To return your product, you should mail your product to: info@lokate.in You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund. Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you, may vary. If you are shipping an item over 8500, you should consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

item.title: Lokate
item.dc:creator: nishikant
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][sc_gallery gallery_gallery="209"][sc_divider margin_bottom="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9"][vc_column_text]

Lokate - Vehicle Tracking, Alerting & Monitoring System

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]First Indian manufactured GPS based Vehicle Tracking, Monitoring & Security system. Lokateprovides centralize monitoring system to manage & track your vehicles. Lokatedevice consists of a GPS tracker, which determines the location by Satellites. Location is transferred over mobile phone network of our preferred supplier. Lokateweb interface is very user friendly and easy to use. Each user hastheir own secure Customer Id and password for tracking their vehicles.Provides tracking on the best maps of the world - Google Maps. Lokateprovides comprehensive reporting tool. Compare your business events for more effective operations, time and money management.[/vc_column_text][sc_button link_target="_blank" link="wwww.lokate.com" text="Visit Lokate" color="#ffffff" background_color="#81d742"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][sc_divider style="3"][vc_column_text]

Features

  • Live view of your vehicle on map
  • Pan India Coverage
  • Geo fencing -You can define an area and get SMS alert when your vehicle crosses
  • Reports generate customized report as per your needs
  • Details of your vehicle: Speed | Stoppages | Idling | 90 days History | Distance
  • Fuel re-fill details (Accuracy up to 60%)(Not applicable in case of Digital floater)
  • Details of sudden brakes applied on vehicle
  • Status by SMS send SMS to get the details of the device
  • History of travelled route for past 30 days
  • Mobile website to track the vehicle details via mobile
  • Option to download/upload data for taking backup for more than 30 days
  • SMS alerts ignition on, halt, over-speed, geo-boundary
[/vc_column_text][sc_diagram type="circle" title="Features" summary="Hover me!"][sc_skill title="Affordability" amount="55" color="#ffaa96"] [sc_skill title="Smooth Experience" amount="77" color="#abde8b"] [sc_skill title="Durability" amount="62" color="#d35270"] [sc_skill title="Usability & Design" amount="70" color="#4b5767"][/sc_diagram][sc_divider color="#d2dae1" margin_bottom="60" margin_top="10"][sc_divider margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]

OurGoals

[/vc_column_text][sc_textbox shadow="1" title_background_color="#f1f5f8" border_color="#d2dae1"][sc_dropcap shape="circle" letter="1" background_color="#4a93a8" color="#ffffff"][vc_column_text]
Offer unmatched service delivery to our clients.
[/vc_column_text][sc_divider color="#d2dae1" margin_bottom="20"][sc_dropcap shape="circle" letter="2" background_color="#4ec0ac" color="#ffffff"][vc_column_text]
Encourage start-up organizations with innovative products.
[/vc_column_text][sc_divider color="#d2dae1" margin_bottom="20"][sc_dropcap shape="circle" letter="3" background_color="#8bbc7c" color="#ffffff"][vc_column_text]
A skilled and highly organised team with strong commitment.
[/vc_column_text][sc_divider margin_bottom="-15"][/sc_textbox][sc_divider margin_bottom="30"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Core Benefits

[/vc_column_text][vc_accordion active_tab="1"][vc_accordion_tab title="Cost Control"][vc_column_text]Vehicle tracking systems can help us to reduce running costs by specifically targeting thosewho speed and waste fuel. By focusing upon these drivers it is possible to not only reduce fueland maintenance bills, but to also reduce insurance premiums[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Increased Productivity"][vc_column_text]Productivity of workers can be increased by being able to keep track of lunch hours, exposingunauthorized stops and breaks and by evaluating the overtime requests of workers. By havingdetailed information on the whereabouts of vehicles at all times, it is far easier to keep an eyeon employee activities[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Reduce Phone Bills"][vc_column_text]Vehicle tracking systems will immensely reduce your phone bills as it is no longer a necessity toconstantly call employees to find their location[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Reduce Paper Works"][vc_column_text]GPS systems reduce the amount of paperwork that drivers must fill out. By doing this you notonly soften the blow of introducing such a system, but also increase the accuracy of yourrecords. It could be integrated with the billing system for billing at the month end.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

CLIENTS LIST

The design that matters.

Beautifully handcrafted for you to make this software easy to use and fulfill the business needs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="20" css=".vc_custom_1499605365355{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="6316" img_size="large"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499605510033{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"]

Real Time Tracking

Sit back, relax and track your vehicles real time with a click of a button. Get a precise and accurate location of a particular vehicle at that specific moment. You can even message the driver real time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="20" css=".vc_custom_1499605397750{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499605770887{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"]

Boundary Alert

Sit back, relax and track your vehicles real time with a click of a button. Get a precise and accurate location of a particular vehicle at that specific moment. You can even message the driver real time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="6317" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="20" css=".vc_custom_1499605737767{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="6318" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499605693904{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"]

Monthly Reports

Sit back, relax and track your vehicles real time with a click of a button. Get a precise and accurate location of a particular vehicle at that specific moment. You can even message the driver real time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]
Cost control
Vehicle tracking systems can help us to reduce running costs by specifically targeting thosewho speed and waste fuel. By focusing upon these drivers it is possible to not only reduce fueland maintenance bills, but to also reduce insurance premiums
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]
Increase productivity
Productivity of workers can be increased by being able to keep track of lunch hours, exposingunauthorized stops and breaks and by evaluating the overtime requests of workers. By havingdetailed information on the whereabouts of vehicles at all times, it is far easier to keep an eyeon employee activities
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]
Reduce phone bills
Vehicle tracking systems will immensely reduce your phone bills as it is no longer a necessity toconstantly call employees to find their location
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]
Reduce paper works
GPS systems reduce the amount of paperwork that drivers must fill out. By doing this you notonly soften the blow of introducing such a system, but also increase the accuracy of yourrecords. It could be integrated with the billing system for billing at the month end.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Features: " font_container="tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23000000"][vc_row_inner gap="30"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sc_list type="pin"]
  • Live view of your vehicle on map
  • Pan India Coverage
  • Geo fencing -You can define an area and get SMS alert when your vehicle crosses
  • Reports generate customized report as per your needs
[/sc_list][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sc_list type="pin"]
  • Details of your vehicle: Speed | Stoppages | Idling | 90 days History | Distance
  • Fuel re-fill details (Accuracy up to 60%)(Not applicable in case of Digital floater)
  • Details of sudden brakes applied on vehicle
  • Status by SMS send SMS to get the details of the device
[/sc_list][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][sc_list type="pin"]
  • History of travelled route for past 30 days
  • Mobile website to track the vehicle details via mobile
  • Option to download/upload data for taking backup for more than 30 days
  • SMS alerts ignition on, halt, over-speed, geo-boundary
[/sc_list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1499244992560{margin-top: 100px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="1st Made in India tracking hardware" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23000000"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499253264526{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]

Global Reach
This hardware works in pan India and uses any local mobile network to connect without a need for SIM-card or data subscription. It uses any available 2G, 3G or 4G network.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499252936520{margin-top: 50px !important;}"]
Truly Smart
Our hardware contains a battery that can last for weeks without any external power, but it can also be connected to any 12 or 24 V source and will never have to be removed for recharging.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="6313" img_size="400x500" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499252894585{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]
Unbeatable Precision
A high precision GPS receiver with proprietary antenna technology gives you precise information. You can place it anywhere on the asset where it is not visible to the user and yet track accurately.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499252952262{margin-top: 50px !important;}"]
